EmailTemplate.subject: 75% of Your C-Store Shoppers Will Go Here More
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The global pandemic changed a lot of things—but none more than your c-store shoppers’ psychology. They’re not as loyal to brands; right now, availability and safety are the new loyalty. Consumers want to get in and out even faster. And that means self-checkout. Indeed, 75% of shoppers say they’re likely to go to convenience store self-checkouts amid the pandemic.
